item.description:
Ghost Hunting at the Museum (haunted house)
The Charles River Museum of Industry and Innovation and DorkbotBoston dares you to go on a family friendly ghost hunt in our special Halloween robots exhibit.
Through the imagination of DorkbotBoston, a local robotics club, the museum’s temporary exhibit space is transformed into haunted halls filled with ghoulish technology and apparitions. The ghosts in this exhibit, entitled “Ghost-hunting,” are not of the white sheet variety, but rather are conjured up from thin air and interact with you. Reservations strongly encouraged. Admission is $7 per adult and $5.00 per child. Children under 5 free.
http://www.crmi.org...
781 893 5410

After the Museum we will go to Margarita's Mexican Restaurant.
211 Moody St.
Waltham.
http://www.margs.com/...
Please indicate if you are going to dinner or not on your rsvp.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Ghost Hunting at the Museum
